title: Forest: Focus for Productivity
description:
Forest helps you stay focused and present throughout your day.
Grow virtual trees as you focus on tasks without distractions.
Track your focus time and build a healthy routine.
Set daily goals and monitor your productivity trends.
Join a community of users who are growing forests together.
Use the gamified approach to make productivity fun and engaging.
Lock your phone temporarily to grow bigger trees.
Track your sessions with a detailed timeline and history.
Export your focus stats for personal insights and reflection.
Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone wanting to build habits.

description:

Receive smart notifications so nothing gets forgotten.
Track your completed tasks and measure your progress.

Analyze your weekly and monthly productivity reports.
Ideal for students, professionals, and busy households.
